long_description: Made of highly visible and durable Cordura(R) nylon, this throw bag is filled with 70 feet of floating 1/4" polypropylene rope. Internal flotation and floating rescue rope keep the bag on top of the water. Polyethylene sheathed grab loops make for easy grasping. Two-inch mesh panels allow better drainage and reduced dry time. Barrel-lock drawstring incorporated in a flared nylon top for smoother throws, plus easy reloading and closure.
short_description: Made of highly visible and durable Cordura(R) nylon, this throw bag is filled with 70 feet of floating 1/4" polypropylene rope.
